creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: rectangular, squared-off shape; strap attached to bag with metal rings; body of bag and strap stitched overall with geometric designs-predominantly squares and rectangles and predominately in red and maroon; purple and yellow tassel clusters on strap; longer purple tassels on bottom corners and bottom center, embellished with metal elements; bell on long white and red twisted cord on one side
dimension: 11 1/4 x 8 x 6 3/4 in. (28.58 x 20.32 x 17.15 cm) (approximately, without strap or tassels)
title: Bridegroom's wedding day bag
